Description.Text:
Property Location
Comfort Inn Victoria is in the heart of London, walking distance from Apollo Victoria Theatre and Victoria Palace Theatre. This family-friendly guesthouse is close to Buckingham Palace and Big Ben.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 48 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and complimentary newspapers, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (surcharge).

Dining
A complimentary buffet breakfast is included.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
A complimentary buffet breakfast is included.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.


Make yourself at home in one of the 48 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include safes and complimentary newspapers, and you can also request cribs/infant beds (surcharge).

Comfort Inn Victoria is in the heart of London, walking distance from Apollo Victoria Theatre and Victoria Palace Theatre. This family-friendly guesthouse is close to Buckingham Palace and Big Ben.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Apollo Victoria Theatre - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Victoria Palace Theatre - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Westminster Cathedral - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Royal Mews - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Queen's Gallery - 0.7 km / 0.5 mi
Sloane Square - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
St. James Park - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Buckingham Palace - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Chelsea Bridge - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Saatchi Gallery - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Green Park - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Wellington Arch - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Royal Hospital Chelsea - 1.2 km / 0.7 mi
Hyde Park Corner - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Apsley House - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi

The nearest airports are:
London (LCY-London City) - 13.5 km / 8.4 mi
London (LHR-Heathrow) - 21.3 km / 13.2 mi

The preferred airport for Comfort Inn Victoria is London (LHR-Heathrow).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
